sentences.english: We all deplored her lack of good manners.
sentences.chinese: 我們都嘆惜她缺乏好態度。

sentences.english: He is in from height merely ice bewail, be at a loss unexpectedly rise.
sentences.chinese: 他只顧自個兒在冰上嘆惜，竟不知所措起來。

sentences.english: I had been pitying myself for not having books to read.
sentences.chinese: 過去我曾嘆惜過自己沒書讀。

sentences.english: She often cries about the death of her husband.
